about_the_game: This is a classic stand-alone casual puzzle game, mischievous Gophers and activities out, you have to do is put them back into the hole. Whac-a-mole is a lot of games can not be compared to the fun, who dare to head on to give it a hammer, simple and brutal. Click on the left button to start the game, Gopher will continue to emerge from the ground, you need to see the right time, steady, fast under the hammering gopher, hit the successful Gopher will disappear. Cartoon Retro Game Graphics, a different experience, full of fun, eyes and hands to eliminate gophers, not only required fast, but also accurate, can exercise reaction and brain coordination ability. Note that each level is a time set yo, in a certain time, hit the gopher the more your score will be higher. Compared with the ordinary mouse whack-a-mole game, this game is more difficult. Whack-a-mole games like friends to challenge it! Play instructions knock more cute mice, get a higher score!
